result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
16CM2227:
Ct. 1 (Disorderly Conduct-Domestic Abuse)>> 90 Days MCJ, Concurrent. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge and Domestic Abuse Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 0 Days Credit. 

Ct. 2 (BJ)>> 9 Months MCJ, Concurrent. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 0 Days Credit. 

17CF158:
Ct. 1 (Possess w/Intent- Amphetamine- (>10-50g))>> 6 Years WSPS, 2 Years IC and 4 Years ES, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, AODA and Follow up, SAFE Program and Follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, Good Faith Effort to Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 16 Days Credit. Defendant is eligible for SAP, not CIP. 

Ct. 2 (Possession of THC)>> 6 Months MCJ, Concurrent. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 16 Days Credit. 

17CF1041:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>> 5 Years WSPS, 2 Years IC and 3 Years ES, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, AODA and Follow up, SAFE Program and Follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, Good Faith Effort to Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 5 Days Credit. Defendant is eligible for SAP, not CIP. 

Ct. 4 (BJ)>> 9 Months MCJ, Concurrent. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 5 Days Credit. 

17CF1123:
Ct. 1 (Possess w/Intent-Amphetamine (>3-10g)>> 6 Years WSPS, 2 Years IC and 4 Years ES, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, AODA and Follow up, SAFE Program and Follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, Good Faith Effort to Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 71 Days Credit. Defendant is eligible for SAP, not CIP.
